p: Concentrations between 0.1 and 10 ug·mL −1 of piperitenone oxide present in some species of Mentha, presented a potentiating effect of the contraction induced by acetylcholine (ACh) and doses greater than 30 ug·mL −1, were revealedas depressor intestinal smooth muscle in the contractions caused by KCl, Ach, and tetraethylammonium [ 19].
